products.title: Bella Frost Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
Simple stripes have always been something of a staple for harlequin and we just love the way they combine colours to get the most out of this sophisticated design.
  
Bella frost takes a cool blue palette and blends it with some soft greys to bring you a refined and highly cultur
